name: Magic Sign: Acid Armor
description: A mote of energy that smells faintly of lye.  Activate it to gain temporary resistance to corrosive effects.  Direct contact with acid will still harm you.  This will expend the item entirely.

use_action.msg: You activate the acid armor spell.

name: Magic Sign: Acid Armor (active)
description: A mote of energy that smells faintly of lye.

use_action.activation_message: Your body becomes hardened against lingering corrosion.

name: Magic Sign: Acid Spray
description: A mote of energy with a strange, acrid scent.  Activate it to conjure a spray of acid.

use_action.msg: You activate the acid spray spell.

name: Magic Sign: Acid Spray (active)
description: A mote of energy with a strange, acrid scent.

name: Magic Sign: Agility
description: A mote of energy that seems to twitch and shiver.  Activate it to grant a temporary speed and agility-enhancing effect.

use_action.msg: You activate the agility spell.

name: Magic Sign: Agility (active)
description: A mote of energy that seems to twitch and shiver.

use_action.activation_message: Your feel a powerful magical tension fill your body.

name: Magic Sign: Clairvoyance
description: A mote of energy that gives you the faint feeling of being watched.  Activate it to grant a temporary clairvoyance effect.

use_action.msg: You activate the clairvoyance spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Clairvoyance (active)
description: A mote of energy that gives you the faint feeling of being watched.

countdown_action.activation_message: The magic sign granting you clairvoyance dissipates.

name: Magic Sign: Clarity of Blood
description: A mote of energy that pulses like an arrhythmic heartbeat.  Activate it to gain protection against parasites and the Mycus.

use_action.msg: You activate the protective spell.

name: Magic Sign: Clarity of Blood (active)
description: A mote of energy that pulses like an arrhythmic heartbeat.

use_action.activation_message: Your feel an otherworldly sensation course through your veins.

name: Magic Sign: Confuse Monsters
description: A mote of energy, seemingly abuzz with whispered voices.  Activate it to confuse monsters all around you.

use_action.msg: You activate the confusion spell.

name: Magic Sign: Confuse Monsters (active)
description: A mote of energy, seemingly abuzz with whispered voices.

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Lightning
description: A mote of energy abuzz with raw power.  Activate it to conjure a field of electric death from the sign itself, which should be thrown.

use_action.msg: You activate the lightning field spell.  Throw it!

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Lightning (active)
description: A mote of energy abuzz with raw power.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You can't dispel the effect.  Might want to try throwing it instead.

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Smoke
description: A mote of energy, giving off the smell of charred flesh.  Activate it to conjure a cloud of thick, choking smoke from the sign itself, which should be thrown.

use_action.msg: You activate the smokescreen spell.  Throw it!

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Smoke (active)
description: A mote of energy, giving off the smell of charred flesh.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You can't dispel the effect.  Might want to try throwing it instead.

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Toxic Cloud
description: A mote of energy that gives off a strange miasma.  Activate it to conjure a cloud of choking, toxic gas from the sign itself, which should be thrown.

use_action.msg: You activate the toxic cloud spell.  Throw it!

name: Magic Sign: Conjure Toxic Cloud (active)
description: A mote of energy that gives off a strange miasma.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You can't dispel the effect.  Might want to try throwing it instead.

name: Magic Sign: Dampening
description: A mote of energy that feels soft to the touch.  Activate it to grant an effect that will drain energy from nearby flames, and feed off radiation afflicting your body.

use_action.msg: You activate the absorption spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Dampening(active)
description: A mote of energy that feels soft to the touch.

countdown_action.activation_message: The magic sign absorbing flame and radiation fades.

name: Magic Sign: Drain Life
description: A mote of energy with a strange aura of hunger.  Activate it to grant a temporary life-draining effect.

use_action.msg: You activate the life-draining spell.  Drop the sign to dispel it early.

name: Magic Sign: Drain Life (active)
description: A mote of energy with a strange aura of hunger.

countdown_action.activation_message: The magic sign granting you life-draining abilities dissipates.

name: Magic Sign: Fireball
description: A mote of energy that seems to radiate an unearthly heat.  Activate it to project a fiery explosion.

use_action.msg: You activate the fireball spell.

name: Magic Sign: Fireball (active)
description: A mote of energy that seems to radiate an unearthly heat.

name: Magic Sign: Flame Armor
description: A mote of energy that seems cool to the touch.  Activate it to gain temporary resistance to heat and smoke.  Direct contact with flame will still harm you.

use_action.msg: You activate the flame armor spell.

name: Magic Sign: Flame Armor (active)
description: A mote of energy that seems cool to the touch.

use_action.activation_message: Your body becomes innured to heat and choking smoke.

name: Magic Sign: Free Action
description: A mote of energy, shifting and pulsing with your heartbeat.  Activate it to gain protection against paralytic effects and other hindrances.

use_action.msg: You activate the protective spell.

name: Magic Sign: Free Action (active)
description: A mote of energy, shifting and pulsing with your heartbeat.

use_action.activation_message: You feel an otherworldly tension in your muscles, as your body becomes warded against paralytic effects.

use_action.activation_message: Your body becomes innured to winter's chill.

name: Magic Sign: Healing (active)

use_action.activation_message: Your feel a surge of magical energy coursing through every muscle.

name: Magic Sign: Mind Ward

name: Magic Sign: Summon Dark Wyrm
description: A mote of energy with endless coils perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon a dark wyrm.  It is somewhat difficult to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The massive burrowing wyrm is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the massive burrowing wyrm!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Fiend
description: A mote of energy with a smoldering wildfire perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon an ashen revenent.  It is somewhat easy to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The charred undead monster is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the charred undead monster!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Jabberwock
description: A mote of energy with a dozen screaming faces perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon a golem woven of flesh.  It is difficult to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The body of bodies is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the body of bodies!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Homunculus
description: A mote of energy with a leering face perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon a mimicry of the human form.  It is somewhat difficult to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The humanoid construct is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the humanoid construct!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Horrifying Thing
description: A mote of energy with a writhing abomination perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon a horrifying mass of tendrils.  It is difficult to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The mass of tendrils is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the mass of tendrils!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Skeletal Dog
description: A mote of energy with shifting canine shapes perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon an undead hound.  It is easy to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The animalistic revenant is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the animalistic revenant!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Shadow Snake
description: A mote of energy with writhing cloud patterns perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon a serpentine shadow.  It is somewhat easy to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The serpentine shadow is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the serpentine shadow!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Shadow
description: A mote of energy with strange shifting clouds perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon a living shadow.  It is somewhat easy to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The living shadow is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the living shadow!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Skeleton
description: A mote of energy with imagery of the dead perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon the animated dead.  It is somewhat easy to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The humanoid revenant is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the humanoid revenant!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Vortex
description: A mote of energy with swirling shapes perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon the living wind.  It is somewhat difficult to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The swirling wisp is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the swirling wisp!

name: Magic Sign: Summon Yugg
description: A mote of energy with scenes of forbidden wealth perceived inside it.  Activate it to summon a worm-like abomination.  It is very difficult to control.

use_action.friendly_msg: The mutagenic worm beast is at your beck and call.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your magic fails to control the mutagenic worm beast!

name: divine scroll of light (active)
description: This is a scroll, with odd writing and illustrations of a solar motif on it, representing an otherworldly sun deity.  Using it will grant a surge of adrenaline and brighten your spirits, not to mention brighten the sky.

name: divine scroll of darkness (active)
description: This is a scroll, with odd writing and depictions of the lunar cycles on it, representing an otherworldly lunar deity.  Using it will darken the sky temporarily, and confound nearby enemies.

name: divine scroll of command (active)
description: This is a scroll, with odd writing and images of solders in formation on it, representing an otherworldly deity of order.  Using it will attempt to bind nearby creatures to your will temporarily, at the expense of pain and momentary paralysis.

name: divine scroll of regrowth (active)
description: This is a scroll, with odd writing and exotic natural scenery depicted on it, representing an otherworldly deity of chaos.  Using it will fill the area with life, causing plants to grow unnaturally and massively healing you, but potentially mutating you as well.

name: divine scroll of sundering (active)
description: This is a scroll, with odd writing and scenes of endless battle on it, representing an otherworldly war god.  Using it will call forth a horrid noise, toppling nearby structures and harming creatures around you.  It might attract unwanted attention as well.

name: divine scroll of discord (active)
description: This is a scroll, with odd writing and peculiar swirling symbols on it, representing an otherworldly trickster god.  Using it will warp the fabric of space, teleporting you at random.  The trip is a bit nauseating, and you might be followed.
